title: Who Done It?
description: What could be better than a week at the beach?Retired teacher Alex Matthews is eager to accept an invitation to join her friends at a newly-renovated bed and breakfast on tiny Turtleback Island, off the coast of South Carolina. Recently widowed, Alex looks forward to sun, sand, surf … peace and quiet … fresh air … But no one said anything about murder.
author: Theresa Jenner Garrido
